datasets.description: This list of good AMS is from an Analyst working for Ministry of Environment
datasets.name: list_of_good_air_quality_monitoring_stations.csv
datasets.title: List of Air Quality Monitoring Stations (AMS/EMS) which are okay to be considered for this contest

datasets.description: This file contains data about nearest AMS for each Pharamcy in BC. The nearest AMS is computed  from spatial join between Pharamacies and various AMSs and then picking nearest (based on join distance) neighbor AMS  for each Paharmacy.
datasets.name: Pharamacy_Nearest_ACTIVE_EMS_Pairs.csv
datasets.title: For every pharmacy we are listing pharmacy and corresponding nearest Air Quality Monitoring Station

datasets.description: This file contains adjusted drug dispense data per pharamacy. This data is derived from respiratory drug prescription data from Ministry Health.
datasets.name: pharmacy_adjusted_daily_dispense.csv
datasets.title: Daily respiratory drug dispense from a Pharmacy adjuted with respect to population (so no population related adjustment is needed)

datasets.description: Only PM 10 air pollution hourly reading from year 2013 to 2016 have been downloaded from Data BC web site
datasets.name: PM10_hourly_f2013_t2016.zip
datasets.title: Contains four directories one each for years 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016. Each folder has air pollution data for that year in a file named as PM10.csv

datasets.description: Contains ID, address, latitude, longitude, zone etc. of AMSs in BC
datasets.name: bc_air_monitoring_stations.csv
datasets.title: Information regarding various air monitoring stations in BC
